snippet: Grass-roots activists, especially members of the Tea Party, distrust Gov. Chris Christie’s adherence to the party’s principles and resent his favor within the mainstream media.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, fresh from landslide re-election victory and likely headed for Republican presidential candidacy in 2016, has become not only political celebrity but also deeply polarizing force within his party; grass-roots activists, especially Tea Party members, distrust Christie's adherence to party’s principles and resent his favor within mainstream media.
lead_paragraph: Grass-roots activists, especially members of the Tea Party, distrust Gov. Chris Christie’s adherence to the party’s principles and resent his favor within the mainstream media.

headline.main: Conservative Republicans Recoil at the Notion That Christie Is the Party’s Savior
headline.print_headline: Conservative Republicans Recoil at the Notion That Christie Is the Party’s Savior
